participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and creative, enjoys connecting with others and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: I have a soft spot for my parents and sweets. I love watching sitcoms on television. I like to play soccer, draw and read Asterix. My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels. No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

participant_2.name: Linda Thompson
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and adventurous, enjoys challenges and exploring the outdoors.
participant_2.background: I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery. I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet. I am a housewife who loves my cat Cow. I live with my husband and two children. I'm a go-getter and always looking for ways to challenge myself.

content.text: Hello! I am a 30 year old female from the United States. I love to watch sitcoms on tv, draw, and play soccer. I am an addiction recovery coach and I love to read suspense novels. I am also a huge fan of Asterix comics. I am looking for someone to chat with about my favorite tv shows, books, and games.

Hi! I am a 40 year old female from Canada. I am a housewife and I love my cat Cow. I am married with two children and I love to lift heavy weights and have a meatless diet. I am always looking for ways to challenge myself and I love to go hiking and camping. I am also a huge fan of Asterix comics. I am looking for someone to chat with about my favorite tv shows, books, and games.

It sounds like we have a lot in common! I also love to lift weights and have a meatless diet. I love to hike and camp too. I have never been to Canada but I would love to visit someday. What is your favorite thing about Canada?
My favorite thing about Canada is the people. Canadians are so friendly and welcoming. I also love the scenery here. The mountains are beautiful and the lakes are crystal clear.
That sounds amazing! I would love to visit Canada someday.
You should! I am sure you would love it here.
Great! I would love to show you around.
